about_the_game:
"Phantom Asylum" is an immersive VR psychological horror experience that takes you deep into an abandoned, ghost-infested mental hospital. As you navigate the dark corridors of this forgotten institution, you will face fears that will challenge the limits of your mind.

It is not only the ghosts that lurk in dark corners, but also your own sanity that you must protect. Reality, illusion and delusion are intertwined; at any moment, what you see or hear can drive you mad. There are puzzles to solve to survive, threats to face and unseen dangers to escape. But remember, not everything here is only visible to the eye...

Dark and Atmospheric Story: Face fears in the chilling atmosphere of an abandoned mental hospital.

Mind Games: Maintain your sanity while trying to figure out the difference between reality and illusion.

Realistic VR Experience: Live in a suspenseful virtual reality environment where you will be immersed in every detail.

Mystery and Puzzles: Discover the secrets of the hospital and solve clues to find your way out.

Surviving this mind-bending adventure is not just a physical feat, it's also a mental challenge. Will you be able to escape the "Phantom Asylum" or will you be left in the clutches of madness?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 20 + / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR Oculus SDK
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 AMD FX 9500+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 30 + / AMD Radeon+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Oculus SDK

short_description: "Phantom Asylum" is a VR horror game set in the dark and mysterious world of an abandoned mental hospital. In this labyrinth full of ghosts, try to find your way out by keeping both your wits and courage. On the thin line between reality and madness, every step can turn into a nightmare.
